item.title: UX Writing Checklist
item.description: UX Writing refers to text in user interfaces that explains what features do, and tells a user what action will occur by interacting with that element. Lately I’ve been interested in UX Writing (probably because the UI texts in the products I usually document tend to be… improvable). So a few weeks ago I attended a workshop where I learned some basics and where the attendees were encouraged to create their own checklist for UX Writing as a takeaway.
